author: roberts
text:
553 U. S. ____ (2008)553 U. S. ____ (2008)553 U. S. ____ (2008)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESNO. 06-666DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE OF KENTUCKY, et al.,
PETITIONERSv.GEORGE W. DAVIS et ux.on writ of certiorari to the court of appeals of
kentucky[May 19, 2008]Chief Justice Roberts, concurring
in part.I join all but Part III–B of the
opinion of the Court. In my view, the case is readily resolved by
last Term’s decision inUnited Haulers Assn., Inc.v.Oneida-Herkimer Solid Waste Management Authority,550 U.
S. ___ (2007). A majority of the Court shares this view. That being
the case, I see no need to proceed to the alternative analysis in
Part III–B.
